author: dkulp
msg: Add stax-api to direct deps to hopefully fix compile

author: dkulp
msg: Fix for QName in fork mode
* Turn off childDelegation for surfire.  Fixed loading qname in forked tests.
* Remove surefire configs from most poms (since forking now works)
* Remove jsr173-api jars since stax-api from ibiblio now works

author: andreasmyth
msg: Used a Control interface in the RM system test to run differently configured servers/clients.
Added test scenario for deferred acks.
Added info level log message to spring configuration provider when no bean definition for a configurable component can be found (and default configuration will be used instead).

author: seanoc
msg: Support for publishing permissions of endpoint.
WSDL contract available at the endpoint's address suffixed by ?wsdl
